FlavorTextOption.Text: Disturbing reports have begun coming in that pirates have settled a low class colony. They do not seem to be able to make much use of this world but nonetheless we find it disturbing.
If they wish to build legitimate colonies all the better, but if they continue to raid our ships, these worlds will not protect them. [COLOR=BenevolentBlue](Benevolent +15)[/COLOR]
The pirate threat must not be allowed to grow. Also we can certainly make good use of their newly terraformed world, despite its quality. [COLOR=PragmaticGold](Pragmatic +15)[/COLOR]
Excellent, we can use this pathetic colony as training exercises for our fleets and no one will miss a bunch of pirates. [COLOR=WarRed](Malevolent +15)[/COLOR]
